name: Sniper fire Hero
description: Ready to have FUN? Choose your weapon, aim and shoot! If you like war games or FPS games, you will love Fire War Hero Sniper Games! With breathtakingly realistic graphics, discover the most compelling sniper experience on mobile. Become the ultimate silent assassin. Prepare for non-stop action in a true test of your accuracy and speed of execution. Join the war and shoot to kill!
